titles.title: Supporting the designation of August 18, 2021, as "Congressional Startup Day".
Supporting the designation of August 18, 2021, as "Congressional Startup Day".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Consumer Protection and Commerce.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary: This concurrent resolution recognizes the importance of startups to the U.S. economy, supports assisting startups throughout the economic downturn caused by the COVID-19 pandemic, and commits to promoting equal economic opportunity for underrepresented entrepreneurs of all backgrounds.
